calibration_info.basis: Initial estimates for portfolio demo - to be calibrated with real measurements
calibration_info.recommended_calibration: Run 20-50 transfers with different file sizes and update weights

usage_notes.weight_calculation: Weights represent relative time spent in each phase (sum = 1.0)
usage_notes.progress_range: Visual progress bar percentage range for each phase
usage_notes.duration_estimates: Average milliseconds spent in each phase (for ETA calculations)
usage_notes.phase_descriptions: User-friendly messages shown during each phase
usage_notes.adaptive_scaling: Durations scale based on file size and network conditions

small_file_1mb.description: Small files complete faster due to less encryption/transfer time

large_file_50mb.description: Large files take proportionally longer in encryption and transfer phases

real_time_features.phase_transitions: Logged with high-resolution timestamps from C++ client
real_time_features.progress_smoothing: Debounced updates prevent UI flooding during rapid progress changes
